EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_JAX Germany_Munich_Q418.Post Event Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us at W-JAX
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}} {{lead.Last Name:default=}},
Thank you for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at W-JAX. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers.
Need some dev/test or CI environments? Try running Spring Boot on our public Cloud Foundry instance, Pivotal Web Services <[[https://run.pivotal.io/spring/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>, a platform engineered for Spring Boot. In the meantime, start your Cloud-Native Journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>, why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native.
Learn more about what Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry has to offer by viewing the latest content in our resource center <[[https://content.pivotal.io/jax-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>.
Stay in touch with the Spring Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalDACH?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-JAX-Munich-germany-Q418]]>.
Kind regards, The Pivotal Team
